titleStmt.title: Religio bibliopolæ in imitation of Dr. Browns Religio medici, with a supplement to it / by Benj. iBrgwater [sic], Gent.
titleStmt.author: Dunton, John, 1659-1733.
Bridgewater, Benjamin.
Browne, Thomas, Sir, 1605-1682. Religio medici.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Smart ..., and are to be sold at the Raven ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by John Dunton as part of a larger uncompleted work; Dunton here published this part under the name of Bridgewater who assisted him in the writing. cf. NUC pre-1956 v. 151, p. 224.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
